message: Let's make a deal, Bob. I get $60, you get $40. It's a fair offer considering the inflation working against me.
Alice, your offer was a bit too much in your favor. Let's be reasonable, I'll take $55 and you get $45.  The inflation will hit you harder if we wait.
Okay Bob, let's meet in the middle. I'll take $55, you take $45.  This inflation is no joke, let's wrap this up.
